title: Autodesk AutoCAD Civil 3D 2015 SP1 RUS-ENG (AIO) by m0nkrus-=TEA

System requirements:

- 64-bit edition of Microsoft Windows 8 / 8.1 Enterprise, Professional or Core, Windows 7 Enterprise, Ultimate, Professional or Home Premium
- AMD Athlon 64, AMD Opteron, Intel Xeon with support for Intel EM64T, Intel Pentium 4 with Intel EM64T support and SSE2 technology
- 4 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 8 GB for installation and 4GB for program files
- 1280 x 1024 (recommended resolution of 1600 x 1200 or higher) with a regime of full-color palette (True Color)
- Microsoft Internet Explorer 9.0 or later
- To install: connect to the Internet or DVD-ROM drive Additional system requirements for 3D-modeling

- At least 8 GB of RAM
- 9 GB of free disk space (not counting the space needed for installation)
- Video adapter class workstations with the memory of at least 128 MB, supports screen resolution of 1280 x 1024 mode true color, Pixel Shader 3.0 or higher and Direct3D 

Description :

AutoCAD Civil 3D - a solution for the design of infrastructure and documentation based on information modeling (BIM). AutoCAD Civil 3D is designed for engineers working on projects of transport facilities, 
land facilities and water conservation structures. Users are able to coordinate projects to explore design alternatives to simulate the process of the facilities, and produce high quality documentation. 
All this happens in a familiar software environment of AutoCAD. AutoCAD Civil 3D allows you to create more complex and information-intensive projects due to higher performance platforms and expand the functionality of the user. 
Among the new features of the product - work with pressure pipeline networks, improved topographical survey, the establishment of the main card and designing of railways. Improved many of the functions of designing traffic facilities - forming corridors, 
3D-navigation, query and determine

Cusp
1.Merged the two original R1-distributions into one.
2.In the installer adds the ability to establish a local reference for the English, and for the Russian version of the program.
3.In the installer adds the ability to install the module support VBA-macros.
4.In the installer adds the ability to install the module SPDS Extension 4.0 allows to execute drawings in accordance with the requirements of GOST 21.1101-2009 (see. screenshots 4 and 5).
5.In the installation package AutoCAD Civil 3D 2015 will integrate Service Pack 1 .
6.This software, Autodesk ReCap 2015 updated from version 1.3.1.39 to version 1.4.0.132.
7.Utility Autodesk Application Manager updated to version 1.0.59.0 to version 3.0.159.0.
8.Utility Autodesk BIM 360 Glue updated from version 3.32.3004 to version 4.34.2701.
9.Distributions used in the original package .NET Framework 4.5 is replaced by a revised version of the draft [Slim] .NET Framework 4.5.3 Full x86 / x64 , with integrated updates on 26 June 2014.
10.You can also install AutoCAD Civil 3D 2015 software on any supported language, and not only those that are sewn into the installer. Just download ofsayta language pack and the path to it during the installation.
11.In this assembly language program installed is not chosen as usual, but in the console window before beginning the installation (see. Screenshot 1). 
This was done in order to keep all the measurement system shown in the original distributions, but it does not burden the assembly. 
Language of the console window depends on the language of your operating system: on the Russian-language system he is a Russian, 
all the rest - English. When you connect a third-party language pack as described in claim 10, the measurement system will be presented just for the language that was chosen by you before beginning installation.
12.Assembly is relieved of some of the problems arising when connecting the image via a virtual drive, the installer will sometimes require a different drive.
13.Everything you need for treatment, including detailed instructions, is located within the image in the folder Crack.


The procedure for treatment

Start the installation of AutoCAD Civil 3D 2015 using 111-11111111 , 222-22222222 or 333-33333333 as the serial number, and 237G1 as the product code.
Copy crack from Crack folder to your hard drive. Otherwise, it can not work.
Start AutoCAD Civil 3D 2015 and agree to our privacy statement. In the licensing click on "Activate" (Activation), then in the window where you will be notified that "You need to connect to the Internet" (Internet Connection Required), click on "Close" (Close) and confirm the cancellation of the operation. Re-open window licensing, where once again you will need to click the "Activate" (Activation). In the next window, select "I have an activation code Autodesk" (I have an activation code from Autodesk).
As administrator, run the crack (right-click on the file and choose from the drop down menu "Run as administrator") and click in the window keygens button Patch. You should see a window with the message "Successfully patched".
In the Request keygen copy the request code (Request Code) window Licensing Autodesk. Then click the Generate button and the result of the field Activation keygens transfer in the field Activation Code (Activation Code) window Licensing Autodesk. Click "Next" (Next). A message about the successful activation of the product.
NOTE: The generated code activation is slightly longer than the space allocated for a field in the keygen. Try not to lose some characters when copying. But also, I want to note that this code is shorter than the allotted space for it in the Licensing Autodesk. Sixteenth field is left blank, and the fifteenth contains only one character - the letter Z . Activation is not impeded.
Enjoy the registered version of the product!
